languages.text: "И не зря обосрались — Лорд-капитаншество им хвосты накрутили, теперь дубинами почем зря не машут".
"No wonder they shat their pants — {mf|His|Her} Captainship sure did tug on their leash! Won't be waving their clubs about so freely now, will they?"
languages.original_text: "И не зря обосрались — Лорд-капитаншество им хвосты накрутили, теперь дубинами почем зря не машут".

traits.locale_text: "They shat their pants when Their Captainship tugged on the leash. Won't be waving their clubs about so freely now, will they?"

languages.text: « Pas étonnant qu'ils aient chié dans leur froc ! Sa Capitainerie a bien tiré sur leur laisse. Finis les coups de matraque gratuits ! »
languages.original_text: "No wonder they shat their pants — {mf|His|Her} Captainship sure did tug on their leash! Won't be waving their clubs about so freely now, will they?"

traits.locale_text: « Pas étonnant qu'ils aient chié dans leur froc ! Sa Capitainerie a bien tiré sur leur laisse. Finis les coups de matraque gratuits ! »

languages.text: «Con razón se cagaron por la pata abajo: Su Capitanez tiró con ganas de la correa. Ya no agitan tanto las porras, ¿eh?».
languages.original_text: "No wonder they shat their pants — {mf|His|Her} Captainship sure did tug on their leash! Won't be waving their clubs about so freely now, will they?"

traits.locale_text: «Con razón se cagaron por la pata abajo: Su Capitanez tiró con ganas de la correa. Ya no agitan tanto las porras, ¿eh?».

languages.text: 「キャプテンの地位が彼らのリードを強く引いた！奴らはビビり散らかしていた。今はそこまで好きにブンブン武器を振り回してはいないだろう？」
languages.original_text: "No wonder they shat their pants — {mf|His|Her} Captainship sure did tug on their leash! Won't be waving their clubs about so freely now, will they?"

traits.locale_text: 「キャプテンの地位が彼らのリードを強く引いた！奴らはビビり散らかしていた。今はそこまで好きにブンブン武器を振り回してはいないだろう？」

languages.text: “舰长大人一声令下，那些人就全都吓尿了裤子！现在他们可不能像以前那样拿根棍子，想揍谁就揍谁了，是吧？”
languages.original_text: "No wonder they shat their pants — {mf|His|Her} Captainship sure did tug on their leash! Won't be waving their clubs about so freely now, will they?"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人一声令下，那些人就全都吓尿了裤子！现在他们可不能像以前那样拿根棍子，想揍谁就揍谁了，是吧？”

languages.text: "Kein Wunder, dass sie sich eingeschissen haben, als {mf|Seine|Ihre} Captainschaft an ihrer Leine gezogen hat. Jetzt wedeln sie nicht mehr so locker mit ihren Keulen, was?"
languages.original_text: "No wonder they shat their pants — {mf|His|Her} Captainship sure did tug on their leash! Won't be waving their clubs about so freely now, will they?"

traits.locale_text: "Kein Wunder, dass sie sich eingeschissen haben, als {mf|Seine|Ihre} Captainschaft an ihrer Leine gezogen hat. Jetzt wedeln sie nicht mehr so locker mit ihren Keulen, was?"

languages.text: "Donlarına sıçtıklarına şaşmamalı. Kaptan Hazretleri, iplerini iyi çekti tabii! Rahat rahat sopa sallayamazlar artık, öyle ya?"
languages.original_text: "No wonder they shat their pants — {mf|His|Her} Captainship sure did tug on their leash! Won't be waving their clubs about so freely now, will they?"
